Judul: ESTIMATING COMPANY VALUE OF PT. X, A COMPANY IN REAL ESTATE SECTOR
Abstrak: The concern of Corporate Finance has always been in finding ways to maximize the wealth of shareholders, or in other words, to maximize the value of the firm. Therefore, any decision making in Corporate Finance field lies on the view whether the decision will enhance the value of the company. In order to know the effect of a decision toward the value of a firm, the first thing to do is to measure the current value of the firm. Based on this fact, value measurement method has been one of the main research and concern in Corporate Finance.
